title: #532 | NYT RACIST FAKE NEWS EXPOSED! | Bryan Callen Guests | Louder with Crowder
description:
Huge show tonight! Talking Alyssa Milano’s abortion shouting, Brian Stelter flashbacks, Trump’s Fox News frustrations, Liz Warren’s list of mistakes and anti-sex toilets? Also hitting Spike Lee’s slavery stupidity. Bryan Callen guests!

Want to watch the full show every day? Join #MugClub! http://louderwithcrowder.com/mugclub

Use promo codes "student" "veteran" "military" to get daily access for $69/year!
